trans-unit.source: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+4 and gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)

trans-unit.source: "Nobody's seen the Lady of Videns for years. Poor dear, no companions at all in that old castle."\n—Yonda of Gavony

trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Dinosaur card from your hand or pay {1}. Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Dinosaur card from your hand or pay {1}. Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

trans-unit.source: The herds follow as new growth arises.
trans-unit.target: The herds follow as new growth arises.

trans-unit.source: Other Dinosaurs you control get +1/+1. {5}{G}: Create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.
